overview: The first solo stand-up concert by Yuliya Akhmedova in which she honestly and uncompromisingly talks about harassment and why they are not ready to discuss this topic in Russia. It will make fun of depression and relations between men and women. He will also share a life hack on how to convey his problems to his boyfriend. It will be sharp, bold, without patterns! And very funny!
title: Yuliya Akhmedova: No Harassment
